page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: All organised entertainment in this area is confined to the USAF Air Base, RAF Woodbridge. There are various social group activities, including a club for wives, a Youth Centre to en- courage constructive pastimes for young people, and an Arts and Crafts Centre including a theatre group which performs for local hospitals. Various functions are organised throughout the year on American holidays such as Independence Day on 4 July when there is a picnic and fireworks display, as well as the usual Christmas and New Year festivities. The local population eagerly support events at Sutton Village Hall including cricket, bingo, and Country & Western dances. For a special occasion they may travel to Ipswich, Felistowe, or further afield to concerts, theatre, cinema, or to dine out.
